text: The real danger w/the @AstraZeneca mess in Europe is that deficiencies alleged w/one #COVID19 #vaccine will sour the public on all immunization -- which is terrible. I am thrilled that I got my 2-dose @moderna_tx vax & would have been equally happy w/2-dose @pfizer or 1-dose J&J. https://t.co/Bk03p85sYD
